title: Uncover Me
description: Thomas Gallo has been living undercover with the Sun Devils MC for far too long. He's lost track of his life, becoming absorbed in the excess and violence surrounding him. The only bright light in the darkness is Roxanne, a stripper born and raised as a member of the club.When his assignment with the MC draws to a close, he needs to make a decision-- either walk away from Roxanne forever, or take her from the only life she's ever known.But unveiling his true identity may jeopardize more than just his life.
author: Chelle Bliss
